A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie ruins the character of Luke Skywalker and has some of the corniest\, most ridiculous scenes since the prequels. Terrible writing and pacing throughout. I can’t believe that this is the movie they gave us after Force Awakens. The Last Jedi feels like a massive disrespect to Star Wars fans\, and is honestly not a good movie in general. Mark Hamill tried to warn us. Thanks a lot Disney/Rian Johnson.
